page.title: 12HEALTH
page.content:
THE ONLY PEOLE WHO COME TO OUR BLOCK, OTHER THAN IN EMERGENCIES, ARE THE DISTRICT NURSE AND HEALTH VISITOR. THEY COME FROM DUNS WHICH IS ABOUT 14 KM AWAY.
THERE IS A GERIATRIC HOSPITAL IN DUNS, OTHERWISE WE HAVE TO GO TO PEEL, EDINBURGH, BERWICK OR ASHINGTON. IF BABIES ARE BORN IN EDINBURGH THEY ARE SCOTTISH AND IF THEY ARE BORN IN BERWICK OR ASHINGTON THEY ARE ENGLISH. THE DOCTORS ARE AT DUNS, CHIRNSIDE AND NORHAM. THE DENTISTS ARE AT BERWICK, COLDSTREAM OR DUNS.
DUNS IS 7 MILES AWAY AND BERWICK 10 MILES AWAY, SO WE HAVE TO TRAVEL QUITE FAR, FOR CLINICS, ETC..
